-- 叠加访问量 SELECT * FROM (SELECT a.*, IFNULL(v.count, 0) as visitsCount FROM ( SELECT rs_list.num as num, al.id, al.name, al.coverPic FROM
-- 结果ID获取 ( SELECT SUM(ta.rn) as num, ta.type_id FROM ( SELECT 1 as rn, amt.type_id FROM article_map_type amt where amt.type_id = #{typeId} ) ta
group By ta.type_id ) rs_list -- 结果ID获取结束
LEFT JOIN article_label al ON rs_list.type_id = al.id ) a Left join (SELECT target_id, SUM(count) as count FROM visits_count vc WHERE vc.`type` = 100 GROUP BY target_id) v on v.target_id = a.id ) t order by t.name -- 叠加访问量结束

LEFT JOIN article_map_type aml on u_a.article_id = aml.article_id ) all_rs ) u_l_i -- 用户分类ID结束
LEFT JOIN ( select * from visits_count vc WHERE vc.`type` = 100 ) vc on u_l_i.target_id WHERE vc.target_id = u_l_i.target_id GROUP by vc.target_id) v_count ON v_count.id = al.id limit 0,#{cut} -- 访问量结束 -- 分类结束
